instance.description: target priority for catapults in non-siege engagements

float.name: already_assigned_scale
float.comment: Prefer focus fire on a target. All "catapult" sytle tasks should try to eliminate the same building.

group.name: unit_type_score
group.comment: Massive bonus score for buildings because we are scoring combat and non-combat targets at the same time. Because units have way lower health than buildings so the are quicker to kill, but we always want to prioritize buildings over units.

group.name: unit_type_score
group.comment: Keeps have a lot of health, so we need this big bonus to offset the negative score from time_to_kill.

group.name: unit_type_score
group.comment: This is here to prioritize landmarks that are also a keep. The generic priority of landmarks, wonders and other building types is controlled with the non_combat_target_into in the ai_formation_coordinator.

float.name: can_shoot_at_scale
float.comment: prefers target that the ranged siege attackers can already shoot at, to minimize teardown/setting up.
